item.title: case study
item.dc:creator: w
item.content:encoded:
<style>
* { margin: 0; padding: 0 }
body {
	font: 13px/1.3 helvetica, arial, sans-serif;
}

section,figure { display: block; }

.section {
	min-height: 100vh;
	
}

.section:before, .section:after {
	content: '';
	display: table;
}



.bg-black {
	background-color: #000;
	color: #fff;
}

.bg-white {
	background-color: #fff;
	color: #000;
}

.image-wrapper {
	min-height: 100vh;
}



.section-image {
	height: 100vh;
	width: 100%;
	background-size: cover;
	background-position: 50% 0;
	background-repeat: no-repeat;
}

.section-image.image1 {
	background-image: url(/wp-content/themes/jsarc/img/v/case-study/a/agriculture-countryside-crop-585260.jpg);
	background-attachment: fixed;
}
.section-image.image1-2 {
	background-image: url(/wp-content/themes/jsarc/img/v/case-study/a/adult-back-view-brand-457445.jpg);
}
.section-image.image2 {
	background-image: url(/wp-content/themes/jsarc/img/v/case-study/a/architecture-bridge-city-611928.jpg);
}

.section-image.image3 {
	background-image: url(/wp-content/themes/jsarc/img/v/case-study/a/architecture-bridges-buildings-1255409.jpg);
}

.section-image.image4 {
	background-image: url(/wp-content/themes/jsarc/img/v/case-study/a/animal-beach-bird-417172.jpg);
}


.section-content-wrapper {
	min-height: 100vh;
}
.section-content {
	max-width: 800px;
	margin-left: auto;
	margin-right: auto;
	padding-top: 100px;
	padding-bottom: 100px;
}

h2 {
	font-size: 2em;
	text-align: center;
	margin-bottom: 1em;
}

.section-content p {
	font-size: 20px;
	line-height: 1.4;
}
.sticky-container {
	min-height: 120vh;
}
.sticky-item {
	position: relative;
	top: 0;
	left: 0;
}

</style>
</head>

<body><script id="__bs_script__">//<![CDATA[
    document.write("<script async src='/browser-sync/browser-sync-client.js?v=2.24.7'><\/script>".replace("HOST", location.hostname));
//

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {

	var stickyContainer = document.querySelector('.sticky-container'),
		stickyItem = stickyContainer.querySelector('.sticky-item');
	
	var r = function() {
		var rect = stickyContainer.getBoundingClientRect();
		elX = rect.left;
		elY = rect.top;
		elW = rect.width;
		elH = rect.height;
		elB = elY + elH;
		var h = window.innerHeight || document.documentElement.clientHeight || document.body.clientHeight;
	}
	r();

	window.addEventListener('resize', function() {
		r();
	});

	window.addEventListener('scroll', function() {
		var y = window.scrollY || window.pageYOffset;
		var calc = (elH - y + elY) / elH;
		if(y > elY && y < elB) {
			stickyItem.style.opacity = calc;
			stickyItem.style.position = 'fixed';
			if (calc > 1) {
				stickyItem.style.opacity = 1;
			}
			else if (calc < 0) {
				stickyItem.style.opacity = 0;
			}
		}
		else {
			stickyItem.style.opacity = 1;
			stickyItem.style.position = 'relative';
		}
	});
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
});

]]>

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: w
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.
